--- create_table_types.sql
create table types (
  b bool,
  i int64,
  f float64,
  d date,
  t timestamp,
  s string(256),
  smax string(max),
  bs bytes(256),
  bsmax bytes(max),
  ab array<bool>,
  abs array<bytes(max)>
) primary key (i)

--- AST

  Create: 0,
  Rparen: 212,
  Name:   &ast.Ident{
    NamePos: 13,
    NameEnd: 18,
    Name:    "types",
  },
  Columns: []*ast.ColumnDef{
    &ast.ColumnDef{
      Null: -1,
      Name: &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 23,
        NameEnd: 24,
        Name:    "b",

        NamePos: 25,
        Name:    "BOOL",

      DirPos: -1,

        NamePos: 211,
        NameEnd: 212,
        Name:    "i",
      },
      Dir: "",
    },
  },
  ForeignKeys: []*ast.ForeignKey(nil),
  Cluster:     (*ast.Cluster)(nil),
}

--- SQL
CREATE TABLE types (b BOOL, i INT64, f FLOAT64, d DATE, t TIMESTAMP, s STRING(256), smax STRING(MAX), bs BYTES(256), bsmax BYTES(MAX), ab ARRAY<BOOL>, abs ARRAY<BYTES(MAX)>) PRIMARY KEY (i)
